inn1.comm: very wide of off stump, Parthiv doesn't play at it.
worked off the body to fine leg. India are away, Parthiv is away.
turned to the on side where Samit Patel fields.
down the leg side, the batsman looks to flick but it sails past the keeper and down to fine leg for runs. Apparently went off the pads.
Parthiv plays it into the left of the covers for one more.
another dot ball to end the first over.
and he whangs the first one down the leg side. Kieswetter parries it over to fine leg. More wides.
outside Rahane's off stump, good carry for Finn and he thuds it into Kieswetter's gloves.
edged and dropped by Trott. It was a clean edge from Rahane, straight forward loopy take for Trott at slip, who kept waiting for it and then spilled a dolly.
angled into the body, and Rahane opens his account after being dropped. A couple to midwicket.
Bopara over-rusn a straightforward save in the covers, but no run conceded.
91.6 mph on the speed gun, we hear, and it is played straight to mid-off.
Rahane is forward and mistimes the push to mid-on to end a bustling first over from Finn. He was so pacy that we couldn't see the ball. Or something like that.
Parthiv lets one go through to the keeper.
clipped crisply off the pads through midwicket, as Bresnan drifts into the pads again.
very wide outside off. I guess Bresnan, like us, can't see the stumps. Another extra.
clipped away. Over-pitched on Parthiv's toes and he flicks it away, I am sure with a big flourish too. Four through the leg side.
plays this one into the covers with a defensive push.
short ball, Parthiv is on the hop and gets the ball down to third man.
Parthiv opens the face and steers a length ball backward of point for a single.
full ball outside the off stump, Rahane pushes forward and check-drives to mid-off.
back of a length this time outside off, Rahane guides it to point.
fuller and straight, Rahane nudges to the leg side cautiously.

Parthiv is in big trouble. Run out at the non-striker's end, backing up too far. It was overpitched in Rahane's zone and he played the perfect straight check drive. Finn, on his follow through, tried to stop it with the right hand and ended up helping it along to the stumps. Parthiv was not even in the picture.
full again on Rahane's pads and he clips it sweetly, but straight to square leg.
back of a length around the off stump, Gambhir stays in the crease and defends.
Gambhir walks down the track and looks to cut on the move as the short ball angles away. He can't piece the field, but gets a single.
already a big change from the lengths Bresnan was hitting back home. He's bowling really full to Rahane here. This time, Rahane on-drives to mid-on.
back of a length this time, shaping into Rahane who works it off the hips down to fine leg for a single.
full to Gambhir now, at 135 kph, and he quietly defends to the off side with soft hands.
a hint of inward movement into Gambhir, who check drives to mid-off to end the over.
Rahane stays pinned on the back foot as he waits for a pacy length ball to come beside him before dropping it to the off side.
yorker attempted on off stump, Rahane dead-bats it down the track.
144 kph and back of a length. Finn's beanpole angle allows him to get that ball to jump up and hit the glove as Rahane plays forward. It pops up in front of him, but doesn't carry back to the bowler.

Rahane gets some width and leans into a good-looking square drive, on the up, away from the body, but fully in control as he used the wrists. The ball slows up in the outfield and they get three. Ouch. Short run. Only two given.
Gambhir at his best. This wasn't too full, it just sat up from a length and Gambhir just eases it through the line and threads the covers.
Finn shortens the length and angles it across Gambhir who dabs it from the crease towards point.
pushed down the leg side, Kieswetter tumbles, collects and appeals, and the umpire responds by spreading his arms.

is this pitch on its way to dusty death already? This one keeps low as it angles down the leg side again. Just as well, Rahane was on the back foot and would have been plumb if it had been straight. He was in no position to get bat on it.
fuller length, Rahane carefully turns it around to square leg.
full ball, tempting Gambhir to drive into the covers, and he consciously keeps it down.
Gambhir invokes his inner Ganguly as he dances down the crease while making room, and looks to carve into the off side. Play and a miss.
fuller and wider outside off, Gambhir opens the face and chops it to point.
driving length on middle and off, Gambhir drives it back to the bowler.

that's far too wide outside off. Gambhir did well to actually time the shot as it arrived with spongy bounce well outside the hitting area. He hops and stretches to get the cut away and it barely makes the ropes.
Rahane stays defensive. Full ball on off, blocked into the off side.
shorter length, Rahane opens the bat face and guides it behind point for a single.
touch of width to Gambhir, who steers to point and for a quick single. Not to be had.
Gambhir jumps out once again, and throws the bat at a full toss outside off. He beats point easy, but third man (KP I think) makes a great effort to get there, before letting it go through the legs.
gets the single this time, typical Gambhir tap off the back foot behind point, and Rahane responds.
length ball on middle and leg, turned away cautiously to the leg side.
Gambhir looks to lash a full ball over the leg side, and gets a leading edge that dribbles away safely behind point on the off side. The birthday boy is having a bash or two.
short and pacy outside off, Rahane tries to cut but is beated by the quickness.
fuller on off stump, Rahane gets forward early this time but doesn't drive with conviction.
that ducked into Rahane off the seam, he was clearly surprised as he looked to cut expansively. Good ball, that, from Dernbach.
looks to crack it square this time, without getting the foot across. The timing eludes him and the ball goes straight to cover.
needlessly attempts a back of the hand slower ball now, and he loses the line. It rolls through to a diving Kieswetter, well outside off.
Rahane guides the last ball to backward point.
full ball outside Rahane's off stump, he again seems to be picking the line and length late, leaving him without enough time to play a forceful shot.
Finn bustles down the leg side again, and it is the 7th wide ball of the innings.
pitched up outside off, Rahane pushes into the covers and scampers across. Cover and point both run in, but neither manages to pick it up cleanly.
Gambhir steers a ball angled across him down to third man for a single.
better shot from Rahane, sets himself up for the whip early and eases it to midwicket.
Gambhir leaps out to a wide ball, and ends up yorking himself. He digs it out to mid-off and keeps running for the single.
Rahane opens the face and angles a ball outside off down to third man for a single.
full ball swerving into the pads, Rahane works it to the leg side, again without intent to score. I am reminded of Rahul Dravid's horror first couple of seasons in ODI cricket.
short and wide outside off, it keeps low as it drifts past Rahane's limp attempt to guide it to point.
gets forward well and early this time, guides the full ball into the covers.
Dernbach's back of the hand slower ball again, slips out and is a full toss outside off. Rahane slaps it to the leg side without timing, he was clearly surprised by it. Gets the single, though.
swerving across from Gambhir's middle to off stump, he flicks firmly wide of midwicket for a single.
fast delivery back of a length outside off, Rahane guides it late to third man for a single.
curls in from outside off, Rahane steps back and forces it back down the track.
more flight this time, Rahane gets forward and works with the turn to long-on for a single.
turns away sharply from Gambhir, who waits and forces it square with the turn for a single.

Rahane will want to forget this innings as soon as possible. Swann again strikes in his first over. Rahane's worked himself into a shotless corner, and suddenly tries to break free against spin. He tries to step out to Swann and loft through the off side, but Swann's canny drift takes the ball away before it dips and breaks in, easily beating the shot. Kieswetter completes an easy stumping.
tossed up outside off, Kohli leans out and works it to the leg side.
Kohli is away, on-driving a full ball on off stump to wide mid-on.
short ball angles into Kohli, who drops it square for a single.
this one keeps low on off stump, but Gambhir is alert enough to cover for it, and dink to the leg side for a single.
that curved in sharply in the air, Kohli was forward and pushing to the off side and keeps it out.
short of a length outside off, Kohli defends solidly from beside the line.
another very straight firm drive, the bowler gets his foot in the way, but can't get it back onto the stumps. He kicks it away to mid-on.
length ball worked off the pads through backward square leg for a single.
Kohli again works Swann with the turn from well outside off. Can't beat midwicket this time.
this time he defends with a straight bat to the off side.
leading edge now, Kohli looks to work it to the leg side and the edge goes wide of mid-off.
Gambhir defends a full ball to the off side.
waits the extra moment this time and opens the face to guide the push past the man at cover.
Kohli on-drives past mid-on and gets a single to end the over.
Kohli drives inside out into the covers.
fuller, and Kohli gets the drive through mid-off for a single.
flighted well outside off, Gambhir drives down the ground for one more.
Kohli pushes another single, with the turn into the covers.
Gambhir clips a full ball defensively to the leg side.

boundary after a while, and it comes in risky fashion. Gambhir skates down the pitch and looks to loft down the ground, wide of long-on who isn't right back on the rope. The fielder moves quickly to the left and puts in the dive, but the ball beats him.
tossed up outside off, Kohli drives to cover.
fuller on off stump and defended.
Kohli gets the single this time in front of square.

poor throw and to the wrong end. Kohli makes it. Gambhir dabs into the covers, Kohli calls him for a very risky single, Gambhir reluctantly concurs. The throw went to Kohli's end, and wasn't a direct hit. Kohli could dive in before Kieswetter collected and broke the stumps.
tossed up outside off, Kohli drives to long-off for a single.
clever placement from Gambhir who dinks backward of square with the softest of hands and hustles back for two.
length ball angled into Kohli, who works it off the hips for a single.
angled well outside Gambhir's off stump and he dabs it down to third man for one.
Kohli whips it from well outside off towards midwicket. Looking quite wristy today, is Kohli.

Gambhir does the Ganguly routine again, he leaps out and cracks a wide ball up and over point. He doesn't time it, though, and sweeper covers comes around to field it. The man from the deep yorks the keeper with a horror throw and they get a second. And then next throw back is also wide.
Gambhir stays beside the line and guides quietly to point.
brings the first one into Kohli, who defends down the track.
shaped into the pads again, this time Kohli works it nicely through square leg and sprints back for two.
short ball, Kohli is early on the pull but the ball comes on quicker still. Played without timing to mid-on.
leading edge, not the first time today for Gambhir. He tries to work a ball that is well outside leg through square and it pops up into the covers, landing just short of the man charging in.

the back of the hand slower one does for Gambhir. The full toss is now a genuine wicket-taking delivery! The ball just looped out in slow motion out of Dernbach's fingers, and Gambhir did a double take as he saw it take its time traversing the 22 yards. He tried to slap it away, but missed and was hit on the full just in front of leg stump. Very weird stuff, but I guess that was a good call from umpire Billy.
back of a length outside off, Raina stays behind the line and defends to the off side.
length ball on the pads, Kohli nudges square for another couple.
defends a back of length delivery into the leg side.
fuller outside off, Kohli rolls the wrists over it and plays it to midwicket.
full and angling in, Kohli swat-flicks without the usual violence to midwicket for one.
Raina stays in the crease and defends to the off side.
bouncer to end the over, even on this sluggish pitch, Raina is hustled as he attempts the pull shot and misses.
fullish indipper from outside off, Kohli drives into the covers.
shorter length to Kohli, who stands on his toes and tickles it square for a single.
bumped in short, Raina manages to control the pull well to deep square leg for one.
again that lollypop legcutter. Lick it at your own peril. Kohli gets an outer edge as it jumps away, single to point.
leading edge for Raina now, as he pokes without getting into the shot.
Raina looks to clear mid-off, but doesn't time it at all. He manages to get over the fielder, only just, and gets a couple.
lands the first one on Kohli's pads, and it is eased through square leg for a single.
short of a length on middle and leg, worked to the leg side.
short and pacy, angled across Raina who opens the blade and steers well to third man.
Kohli gets forward and meets a full length ball to play it to the off side.
fuller this time, Kohli again plays it into the covers with harder hands than he would want to use.
Raina is stuck on the crease as he looks to work a full ball on middle and leg. Gets a legbye to square leg.
tossed up from round the stumps, blocked off the front foot
lunges forward keeping bat beside pad, defends a touch in the air but no harm done for Raina
makes some room now outside leg and finds long off with a firm push
lots of air on the ball, nudged with the turn to midwicket
fuller, flighted all the same, a tad slower, he gets forward and turns it to midwicket
finally he finds a length shortish enough to go back to and dab behind point, one is all he'll get
driven to long off for a single
there is that low bounce outside off again as it skids on from over the wicket, dabbed past point off the back foot
full delivery pushed down to long on
the length is shorter this time and it is slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
rocks back for the pull, did not get hold of it with the ball refusing to come on at any decent pace, rolls away through midwicket
neatly bowled, fired in fullish on the stumps, he checks the drive to dig it back to the bowler
pushes forward in front of cover with the turn and completes the single safely, 100 is up
scampering sliding save from burly PAtel at sweeper cover, Swann pitching short and slapped off the back foot to PAtel's right
again Swann drops it short, wonder why, enough time for Kohli to go back and place it wide again of PAtel for two more
fuller this time, he gets forward and wristily turns it in front of square leg
Raina abandons the crease, gets not quite to the pitch but pushes with a straight bat down to long off
tucked through square leg for one
charges out of his crease but gets too close to the pitch of one one fired in and mistimes it back to the bowler who lets it slip through
Raina brings out the slog sweep from well outside off stump, KP at wide long on runs around, gets a hand to it but it trickles in to the boundary, that should have been stopped really
played out on the leg side
pushed with the turn down to long on

Kohli drives off the inner half of the bat straight at the non-striker's stumps, has Patel got a hand to that, the stumps are disturbed, tight one for the third umpire, is Raina's bat back in time as the bails come off? Third umpire Asnani rules in favour of Raina, that could have gone either way
opens the face even as he makes a bit of room and finds sweeper cover with a firm drive
waits for it to turn in from outside off, but tucks it to midwicket
cannot get another short of a length ball ball past midwicket
and again, this time he comes forward and nudges with the turn, right to midwicket
now he tries to launch in to a pull, but Swann bowls it quicker and he mistimes the shot weakly to midwicket
this is top stuff from Swann, he slows the next ball considerably, Kohli is beaten in flight as he charges out, plays it back to Swann
tight line again, tickled to square leg, superb over from Swann
pushed through the bowler's hands to long off for one
gives him the charge, but cannot get hold of the lofted shot, couple of bounce to long on
mistimes the attempted extra cover drive completely as it comes slowly off the pitch and rolls towards the bowler
bowled flatter and turning in, dinked in to the leg side, Kohli almost runs himself up with a charge up the track, the dive back saves him
almost sneaked past him as he came outside his crease, an underedge takes the ball past Kieswetter fine on the off side
another single to end the over
down the track but finds midwicket yet again with the work
low full toss now on the pads, and well, he nudges it to you-know-where
Kohli takes on the flight this time, does not get hold if it well but manages to lift it over midwicket
well played, Raina uses the feet superbly to get to the pitch and lofts over cover with the turn
turned in to the leg side off the front foot
slightly short and immediately pulled hard, there is man in the deep at midwicket
that is well fielded by PAtel, it was slammed back to him with some power, but he did not let it slip past
there has not been much to work with today off the track, Kohli manages a push to long on
reaches out to a widish one outside off and eases it to sweeper cover
well played in the end, he advanced down the pitch, but found he wasn;t anywhere close to the pitch, checks the shot and pushes to extra cover

KP more than redeems himself for that misfield at long on earlier with a superb leaping take on the edge of the long off boundary, Kohli's look shows it all, he looks disgusted in disbelief, he had got to the pitch this time and lofted inside-out over extra cover but KP was around on the boundary and leaped two feet in the air to catch it
typical first-ball response from Dhoni, a purposeful big lunge forward to smother a flat delivery
dip on him fullish from round the stumps, he pushes wide of cover and scampers across
goes very deep in the crease and tucks it behind square leg with the turn
well bowled, flighted on off and turning away, presses forward and pushes to cover
right on target, straightening on off stump from a length, forward defensive from Raina
almost another one, Raina is lured out by the flight but mistimes the lofted shot, so much that it falls well short of long off
shuffles across and pushes back to Swann
back of a length in to Raina, he shuffles across and tentatively plays it out to short midwicket
uses the angle to tickle a shortish one off the pads in front of square leg

Dhoni is almost done in by the lack of bounce on this 145.4 kph delivery, it hardly got up above the knee roll despite being dug in back of a length, was on the stumps too, Dhoni was on the back foot and just managed to get some bat on it as he crouched low
shuffles across and plays out a short of a length ball to midwicket quietly
bounce this time from back of a length and Dhoni snappily tucks it through square leg, races across for the first, RAina refuses the second
finds enough angle on this shortish one in to the body to help it along to long leg
Raina plays it smartly, leaves the crease and makes room outside leg as well, chips with the turn in the air over extra cover and wide of the man at sweeper cover
chips down the track again, but this one is not full enough, it is flatter and he pushes forward down to long off
walks outside his crease but cannot place the nudge past square leg
whew, that turned in a mile, Dhoni was setting himself up for the cut as he saw the short length, but it came in sharply and he had to jab it on the leg side
pushed back to the bowler
paddles this one from a foot outside off and gets it behind square leg, for a single
gets front foot well forward and squeezes a fullish one straight to extra cover
whip-drives a full delivery now but this time it rolls to deepish mid off
skidding on around middle and leg with the angle from wide of the crease, Dhoni gets bat in front of pad and pushes it past Raina to long on
jagging across Raina from back of a length, ending just outside off, he stays in the crease and dead-bats it
gets back leg across but cannot place the wide one past point, mistimes it totally
firm straight push past Dhoni';s stumps off a fuller and straighter one, a fumble at long off but only one conceded in the end
shuffles across and nurdles a flat one behind square leg
lunges forward and turns it with the spin to midwicket
more turn for Swann, Dhoni calmly plays him out towards square leg
the turn gets sharper, on the pads but Dhoni cannot beat square leg
short now, he backs away but sees it bouncing a bit more and slaps it towards cover
eases a fuller one in front of square leg, outstanding figures for Swann
Dhoni gets a lot of bat on this one, it was short outside off, width as well, he goes through the shot with fast hands and places it behind a diving backward point
inside edge as he goes for a drive outside off, the full delivery bounds fine on the leg side off the inside edge, short fine leg gets to it
well timed straight push, gets front foot out to the line of a length ball and gets the single to long off
guided towards point for a single
appeal for lbw, looked to have pitched outside leg stump as Raina missed out on the pull, hit him outside the line of off as well
nothing mistimed about this one, Raina looks so good when he plays this shot, gets forward and across and wills it through extra cover with a straight followthrough, wide of the man in the deep
starts with a pinpoint yorker slanted in from wide of the crease, Dhoni gets bat down just in time
stays a touch back this time to a length ball, and drives with the angle down to long on
well bowled and well fielded as well, again close to the blockhole, Raina is tucked up and digs it back to the bowler's left who gets down in time to stop it
smartly done, slower one on a length as he saw Raina backing away, only a push down the ground results
Bresnan goes full again but this time Dhoni is ready, he makes a bit of room outside leg and thrashes it through extra cover with flailing arms
nothing to be done with this one though, perfect length in the blockhole, Dhoni jams it out
Dernbach starts with a delivery that would have tested the umpire for the wide call had it been to Dhoni, it is against Raina and ends up a mile outside leg
another wide, not as w-i-d-e as the previous one, it even moved in towards Raina in the air but still ended outside leg
this is what he has been trying to do, get it to move in and land in the blockhole, succeeds the third time, Raina jabs it away towards midwicket

absolutely no pace to work with, as it comes out of the back of the hand, Raina was ready with a huge backlift, but could only tentatively prod at it as it came outside off, they get across off the inside edge
very full delivery, scoop-whipped in the air down to long on, off the inner part of the blade
Raina happily tears in to this full toss outside leg stump, cranks up and swings heartily behind square leg, well past short fine leg
gets the line and length both spot on now, full on the stumps, Raina dabs it towards cover as he backs away
that absolutely refused to come to Dhoni, it looped up from back of a length, he had an age to decide what to do and ended up slapping it to extra cover
scrambling sliding stop at cover as Raina makes room to guide a length ball
reaches forward to a dipping full toss and drives it down to long off
Raina was setting himself up by getting front leg out of the way, Bresnan zoomed in to the blockhole and RAina could only open the face to guide it past covers
another very full ball, Dhoni dinks it for a single
this one is in Raina's zone and he takes it for a boundary, bends the knee to a length ball and launches it in the air over extra cover
fifty for Raina, superb stroke to bring it up, Bresnan missing the blockhole length by some way and Raina shuffles, gets underneath the ball and lifts it absolutely straight, over the sightscreen
Dhoni powers away for a boundary, gets across and whips a fullish incoming ball straight past Finn
Dhoni shows it is not all about the muscle, the full length hurts England again, Dhoni opens the face and the ball flies over extra cover
eep, the high full toss from Finn in to Dhono's body, Dhoni hurriedly jabs it towards square leg
Raina misses out this time, Finn angles a full one wide across him and he cannot make contact as he reaches out
clatter! Raina takes on the man at long on, with a bent-knee slog-smash off a length ball, comfortably clears Bopara on the boundary

he lives and falls by the shot again, tries the slog-smash off a widish going across outside off and slices it high for point to take a tumbling catch as he hurtles back, Raina gone in the Powerplay just when he was starting to hurt England, big breeak
whoa, that has jagged away from a length at more than 90 miles an hour, superb line close to off draws the left-hander forward and has him hanging his bat inside the line
starts with a wide slower short ball from back of the hand, Dhoni lets it go, the ball dies on Kieswetter, and squirts past him
Dernbach recovers well with a pitched up ball, squeezed out to extra cover off the front foot
tucks a back of a length ball towards midwicket and is away
coming in in the air on a full length outside off, Dhoni cannot get enough on it and mistimes it wide of extra cover
well, well, that is a very fine shot from Jadeja, he just stands in the crease and hits through a length ball on the up, it fairly flies to the left of wide mid off
closes the face early to try and work a back of a length ball towards square leg, leading edge takes it on the other side towards point
gets the slower one on target just outside off, Dhoni waits for it and guides it wide of point for one
pushes forward in defence to a flat delivery
quick and flat, he gets forward and places it on the off side for a sharp single
cannot nudge it with the turn past midwicket
does not get hold of the shortish one, came on quickly and he mistimed it on the bounce to midwicket
pushed back to the bowler
Samit goes tearing in to Dhoni to stop a push from Jadeja and Dhoni, out of breath, somehow manages to belatedly gather steam and scurry across before the throw comes in to Kieswetter
pushed in the air off the front foot but wide of extra cover
Dhoni's feet are all over the crease as he gets across and tickles a short of a length ball fine and wide of long leg
that could have gone, but Jadeja got on his toes to a rising widish one outside off and slapped it straight to point
slow short ball, well bowled, Jadeja was looking at midwicket but had to dab it late behind point in the end
Dhoni hooks and the top edge flies fine on the leg side well wide of long leg, the short ball was well-directed, right in to him, but he got some bat on it, with these bats, some is more than enough
gets on top of the short ball and slaps it past point
turning in from outside off, squeezed past the bowler down the ground
rolls away fine on the leg side off the pad
looks to take him on as he comes out of the crease, but Patel shortens the length and Dhoni only pushes it to extra cover
there was grip and turn on this one, but Dhoni used it superbly, stretching forward and lofting it flat over extra cover
nudged on the leg side for a single
advances down the track but Patel drags it back a shade and Jadeja cannot do much with it
stays back in the crease, but this one skids on from back of a length and he whips it through midwicket
well played, backs away and takes a length ball from off stump, but cannot place it wide of short third man
helped in to the leg side behind square leg, and Dhoni hurries back for the second, makes it without fuss
slower and fullish on middle and leg, he waits and turns it softly behind square
tucked in front of square leg

Dhoni gets to yet another fifty in ODIs in typical fashion, with a busy shuffle and sharp nudge through square leg, has enough in the legs to sprint back, raises the bat to acknowledge the applause, brilliantly effective limited-overs batting
Jadeja down the wicket looking for cow corner, it was bowled flat and he just gets it over midwicket, there is a man in the deep too
absolutely hammered down the ground to long on
emphatic from JAdeja, gets to the pitch and cracks the straight hit off the middle of the bat, watches it disappear over the sightscreen
another one, this is right in the left-hander;s hitting zone, again he skips to the pitch, fetches it from well outside off and slams it high over wide long on
flatter still and pushed through outside off, he stays in the crease and dabs it to point
down the track again but does not get enough under this full toss and gets it along the ground to long on
slower one, he allows it to come on and opens the face to run it wide of point
slower delivery but smartly nudged towards vacant midwicket, and by the time long on gets to it, Dhoni has raced across for two

there comes the scoop-whip, near-helicopter, call it what you will, Dhoni stays in the crease and gets the length ball through midwicket, KP runs across from long on and lets it slip through after putting in the slide
squeezes a full one outside off down to long off for one
backs away a tad and hits a length ball flat in the air, one bounce to long off

sharp work from Bresnan, he has caught Jadeja short after he backs away too much, Dhoni squeezed out a yorker outside off, Bresnan raced towards the ball even as Jadeja charged up the wicket, saw Bresnan was already on to the ball, turned around and ran back, but Bresnan caught him short with a direct hit
guided in front of point for one
slower length ball on off, there is nothing on it for Dhoni to get any timing on the attempted work towards midwicket
slants it full and wide outside off stump
nicely bowled, inswinging yorker right on off, Dhoni gets the bat down to jam it away
slower ball produces the thick edge which runs away past short third man, Dhoni stood deep in the crease and drove at it
stays back again and squeezes the drive off a length ball down to long off
shuffles well across to one slanted in, could have been a wide had he left it, but he tucked it towards square leg for one
well played, he remains in the crease and runs one from close to the body to third man
opens the face and guides a bouncing delivery towards point
Ashwin opens up, gets a long way across and swings off an inside edge behind square leg, India will take it
slower one outside off, he dabs it to third man for one
homing in in to the blockhole, Dhoni jams it away and right away calls for a change of bats
full and some way outside off, Ashwin cannot get to it
there is the full helicopter from Dhoni, he sees a length ball and scoops it, standing in the crease, it goes over Patel at long on

Finn runs Ashwin out, Dhoni stayed back again but could not get enough under this full delivery, they went for the single, but Finn kept running in his followthrough, and lobbed the ball on to the striker's stumps with Ashwin well short
PK gets a short of a length ball first up and slaps it straight to backward point
the straight helicopter now, Dhoni is middling them consistently today, full outside off, he creates the hittable length by staying deep in the crease and slams it straight past the bowler
now he shows off his placement skills, opening the face to another full one outside off and sending it flying through point, of course, he went hard at it too
slapped away on the off side for one
misses out as he has a big heaves at a full and wide one outside off
full and wide outside off is the intent, full and too wide is the result
slammed straight from outside off, PK is in the way and it rolls away towards square leg
tries to whip from a mile outside off stump, gets it towards square leg, not far but he still runs two

all versions of the helicopter on display, Dhoni goes over point with the shot now, incredible, he stands again deep in the crease and scoops it in the air, and more incredibly he has enough in the legs to come back
has another go to a length ball outside off stump, misses, for once
Dernbach confuses Dhoni with a full slower one, and the ball rolls away fine on the leg side

inn2.comm: some gentle swing on offer first up, moving away from the left-handed Cook, who stands at the crease and defends back down the track
a touch fuller from Praveen, and Cook moves forward to drive
another length delivery, heading for the top of off, and Cook defends
not much through the air or off the pitch for Praveen, and the bounce is already a little on the low side too. Cook defends to extra cover
a wobbling medium-paced delivery is pushed softly into the covers
a swing and a miss outside off! Praveen offered width for the first time in the over but Cook perhaps just tried to hit it a little too hard, and couldn't make contact
Vinay is on target straight away, shaping one away from Kieswetter on a middle and off line. Kieswetter offers studied defence in response

well timed! Kieswetter actually seemed to have been squared up a bit by this one as he shaped to flick through midwicket, but the ball hit the middle of the bat and ended up beating a diving straight mid on
Kieswetter attempts a whip to square leg but is beaten, and struck on the pad. Definitely slipping down leg
Vinay is a touch straight again, and this time Kieswetter's glance rolls down to fine leg
on a length and straight, and Kieswetter defends
the ball takes the inner half of the bat and rolls through midwicket, finding enough of a gap for a quick single
full and straight, Kieswetter stepping forward in defence

edged, and gone! Praveen has struck with the new ball. He zinged one down on a full length and got the ball to seam away from Kieswetter, who fished at it away from his body and sent a clear edge through to Dhoni. India will be mightily pleased with this early strike, which will stall England's hopes of attacking the new ball
KP walks across his stumps first ball, fetching an off-stump delivery across to midwicket
this one shapes gently in to Pietersen, who props half forward in defence
Pietersen gets off the mark with a little tuck into the leg side, and an ambled single
metronomic stuff from Praveen, and Cook can only tap this straight delivery back down the wicket
nicely bowled by Vinay, not giving Pietersen anything to work with, the delivery landing on a good length

he lost sight of that one! Pietersen wasn't expecting the short delivery, yet that was exactly what he got. He took his eyes off it and turned away, and was struck on the bicep. If it hurts, he's not showing it. The crowd liked that one
nice line and length once more from Vinay, Pietersen defending back down the track
well, this did keep a little low but Pietersen made a meal out of it, bending right down low in an exaggerated manner as the ball took the toe end. He's standing right out of his crease to the quicks
nice touch from KP, glancing the ball to the fine leg boundary with minimum fuss. This was too straight from Vinay, particularly with fine leg up
nudged just wide of midwicket for a single to end the over
edged! Praveen bustles in and finds the outside edge of KP's bat with a touch of seam movement, but there's no slip in place and third man is very square
flicked off the pads through square leg. Praveen's having a word with KP as he completes the single, all good natured stuff though, smiles all round
Cook is off the mark, finally! And he does so by shovelling through midwicket in typical style
the England captain comes forward in jabbing defence to a testing full length delivery
a flashing cut! Praveen offers width and a helpfully short length, and Cook won't miss out. The bowler is annoyed with himself, as he should be
good, hard running from the England batsmen adds three runs to the total after Cook works one deftly off the hip
Cook stands tall and tries to force one through the covers, but he's not found the requisite timing

there was a yelped "catch it!" from the bowler as Cook came forward to drive to cover, the ball sticking in the wicket a touch and the shot staying airborne for a while. Cook took the bottom hand out of the shot to try and keep it down
chopped down behind square on the off side
KP seems to hint that this has kept a little low outside off again. It did die in the wicket a touch, taking the toe end
and this one has leapt! We're seeing some variable bounce now, this one has absolutely spat off a full length, and KP is in some pain after being struck on the finger. The crowd are loving it
Pietersen continues to do his best to entertain the punters, setting off on a red bull run after a tapped drive to mid-off. He had to stretch to get home
Pietersen is still struggling a bit after that blow to the hand. He came forward to defend a length delivery and took the left hand off the bat straight away, shaking it in discomfort
Praveen has reverted to type after his brain-wrongs in the last over, and draws another defensive stroke with an accurate length delivery
nudged back to the bowler, who picks the ball up and threatens to throw down the stumps, sending KP scurrying back to his crease
worked into the leg side by Pietersen, but he pings the midwicket fielder
the slower delivery from Praveen, a cutter, and it's tapped back to the bowler, who palms it to mid on
ah, such a good over up to this point. Praveen trundled in and offered a hit-me delivery wide of off, and KP obliged in fine style, thrashing him through cover point
good fielding at backward point! Cook stepped back to slash a cut but the shot was cut off with a diving stop
low bounce once again, and the ball zips under the bat off a full length. Fortunately for KP it was wide of off
full, just outside off, and Pietersen drives to cover
a firm push goes to mid off this time, where it's cleanly cut off
flicked in front of mid on, who is a little tardy getting in and allows a scampered single
Cook stands at the crease and cracks one hard to cover, but straight at the fielder
typically full and straight from Praveen, and KP can't get him away
again it seems mid on is just a little deep. KP taps the ball in that direction and this time is not even particularly hurried in completing the single
bottom edged! Cook thought his stumps might be in danger after chopping this cut straight down, but the ball bounced and rolled wide of them
the cut goes just wide of the point fielder, who manages to cut it off but can't stop the single
wobbling around on a length, in the channel outside off. KP taps softly to cover
Pietersen strides across his stumps to change the angle of this delivery, flicking through square leg for a single

Pietersen is run out! Where was the dive? He nudged to mid on and set off - as he has done a couple of times in the last few overs -  but this time the fielder sprinted in quickly and fired in a shy, finding KP inches short. It was Ashwin with the throw, and the crowd are cheering Pietersen's demise
Cook shrugs off the dismissal of Pietersen with a confident, lofted pull in front of square. The shot was most certainly on, the ball sitting up at a friendly pace, but he nailed it superbly
that's better from Vinay, much fuller and Cook mis-times a drive to cover
punched firmly off the back foot, mid off running in to stop the single
clubbed through cover. This isn't the easiest pitch to time drives on, but this delivery was really wide and Cook absolutely hammered it. The off side field didn't even really move at all
driven firmly into the covers, and straight to the fielder
very full outside off, and Trott squeezes him through gully for a couple
chopped down behind square, just the single this time
a little too straight from Kohli, and Cook works him off the pad for a single
lobbed down on a length, and a bemused Trott can only push it back to the bowler
a hint of movement in to the right-hander off the pitch, but it takes the ball towards Trott's pads and a single to midwicket is the result
Cook looks a little ungainly as he stands at the crease to defend a full delivery back to the bowler. A bit French cricket really. But that's his style, I suppose, and it's pretty effective
he's a little off line to start, but the punishment isn't too severe as he's glanced to fine leg
speared well wide of off this time, and that's a clear wide. He looks a touch nervous
this is really rather wide once again, but Cook stretches into a drive that is toe-ended to extra cover
a bottom edge? This one really scuttled through very low off the wicket, hardly bounced at all. Dhoni thrust his hands down and, though he couldn't quite stop it cleanly, did enough to negate the bye
the backward point fielder gets a hand on a savage Cook cut, and keeps them to a single
nicely full and straight from Yadav, Trott tapping to mid on
glanced off the hip with superb timing, but square leg is in quickly to keep them to one
pushed through at slow medium pace, Trott thrusting at it from the crease
nudged into the leg side for one
flicked off the toes to square leg
some energetic, committed fielding from a sliding Rahane at mid on saves the single
and now Raina joins in! The crowd show their appreciation as he dives across to stop a drive at mid off
eased down the ground for a single
Trott does well to continue turning the strike over with a quick single

slashed to third man! Cook was hurried by Yadav's extra pace, but in the end that only made the delivery more costly as the top edged cut raced to the third man boundary before the fielder could get across
another short delivery, and it's a well-directed bouncer. Cook deals with it well enough, however, pulling to square leg
fuller this time, and straight, Trott nurdling the ball into the leg side
there's an optimistic appeal as the ball touches something on the way down the leg side ... but that's pad and nothing else
the slower one from Yadav, but it's picked by Trott, who finds a tip-and-run single to cover
very full outside the off stump, and the ball is dug out to cover point
wide again, but this time the ball lands on a length and is slashed out to deep cover
Kohli comes round the wicket to Cook, who is a little squared up as he pushes back to the bowler
the bottom hand comes into the stroke as Cook fetches one to midwicket
a touch short from Kohli, and Trott rocked back to pull ... but the ball slid past his bottom edge to strike him on the thigh
punched away off the back foot, and a single is taken
back of a length and whipped away down to long leg
comes forward and drives into the off side but can't get in through the inner ring
drifting on the pads and picked off by Trott out to deep square, but Dhoni won't mind singles during the fielding restrictions
short and wide, Cook goes for the upper cut which lands in front of third man then bounces over Praveen's head across the boundary
pulled off a good length, was actually quite full for the shot, and it goes through straight midwicket
good length on off stump, pushed towards mid-off who is fairly deep
tucked off the stumps straight to square leg
fuller this time, Cook plays slightly across his front pad towards mid on
gets this through the leg side as he flicks from off stump out to deep midwicket
neatly played by Trott, on the back foot and nudges his favourite whip through midwicket
he works with the angle and plays it from off stump through the leg side
comes across his stumps and clips this from around middle and off out to deep square
starts on middle and leg, flicked out to deep square
round the wicket to Cook, strides forward then defends to the leg side
this one skids through a little and Cook has to jab down
he goes down early to sweep, the ball is a touch short but he fetches it in front of square
hint of turn as this takes a leading edge to the off side
uses his feet, makes it into a full toss and drives powerful past a diving mid-off...good intent from Cook
worked off the stumps through midwicket...steady accumulation at the moment
big wide down the leg side, the bowler is trying hard not to give Cook width outside off
appeal for lbw, but it's hard to get one from the angle around the wicket. Cook fell across the shot a touch and there's an edge anyway
very full and worked out to the leg-side sweeper
comes forward and drives without much timing to cover
leg-stump half volley which Cook flicks to deep square to reach his fifty at a run-a-ball. Another good innings from the England captain
dug out wide of mid-on who is on the edge of the circle so Trott keeps the strike
hoicked from off stump into the leg side but doesn't beat midwicket
punched off the back foot this time and midwicket in action again
finds a gap down the ground to long on
an appeal for lbw as Cook sweeps but he looked outside the line...which he was by a country mile
uses his feet then nudges into the leg side
dragged down short and Cook will feel he missed out as his pulled finds deep midwicket
brings out the reverse sweep and takes this from middle stump through backward point
more conventional this time as he works it off the back foot to deep square-leg
round the wicket to Trott who misses out as he tries to cut
driven down the ground to long off
nudged into the on side
steps forward then rocks back to cut through the off side and it's placed nicely wide of the sweeper
pushed down to long on
waits for this then opens the face a touch as he drives through cover
flicked to deep square-leg from around off stump
a little short outside off, gives Cook the chance to cut to deep cover
draws Trott onto the front foot and he defends...it was the carrom ball
worked out to midwicket, tight over from Ashwin
swept strongly backward of square and Gambhir dives near the boundary to keep them to two
big appeal from Jadeja but not really anyone else as Cook plays across the line
nudged to midwicket
gone! There's the breakthrough as Cook gives it away. Uses his feet and tries to clear the boundary at deep midwicket but can only pick out the boundary rider
he's off the mark straight away with a dab into the leg side and Bopara sprints back for a second
played out to leg side
he misses another cut at Ashwin, defeated by some low bounce
driven off the back foot down to long on
big stride from Bopara who then drives to deep cover
on the back foot, opens the face and finds the gap through backward point
flicked down the ground
ooh, a sign of pressure? Round the wicket, pushed across Trott who tries to slog-sweep over midwicket but doesn't make contact
driven down to long on
onto the front and another one down the ground
the off side this time as Bopara plays a flowing drive with the same end result

gone! Back-to-back wickets for India and both set batsmen have gone. An ugly shot from Trott as he tries a big sweep and the ball hits leg stump. So it's 26 off 42 balls for Trott. That won't silence the debates
off the mark with an easy nudge off his hip
worked down the ground to long on
tossed up and whipped down to long on with some strong bottom hand
that's the other one from Ashwin and it's pushed into the off side
punched back to the bowler
outside off, Bairstow onto the front foot and pushed down the ground to long on
can't get this away
gone! And another. England falling apart as Bopara drives a return catch to Ashwin. Defeat in the air and early on the shot. Simple take for the bowler
onto the front foot and defends
pushed down to long on
punched firmly off the back foot straight into silly point
hint of turn, Patel comes forward and it takes a thick outside edge into the off side
gone! This is a proper collapse and now Bairstow chips a return catch. Went for the drive, played it firmly, and Jadeja's held a regulation chance. What a spell for him. England falling fast
tossed up from round the wicket, driven into the off side
onto the back foot, worked off the back foot to deep midwicket
tucked to midwicket
a beauty! Completely beats Bresnan with the ball that spins away from the right hander
more turn, this one spins back in to Bresnan who gets an inside edge
not convincing but he flashes this away past slip through short third man, almost defeated by some extra bounce
another carrom ball to end the over and it's driven back to the bowler
worked off the back foot to midwicket
stays deep the crease and cuts through backward point
full on middle and leg, defended back to the bowler
quicker ball and Patel can't beat mid-on
more air this time, the batsman comes forward and defends
defended into the off side
driven down the pitch and Ashwin dives to his right to field
that's No. 7, a real old-style England collapse. Fired down the leg side which beat Bresnan as he came down the pitch. MS Dhoni was very alert with a smart stumping
pushed tentatively through mid-off
the carrom ball once more, but it's read off the pitch and chopped through gully
a booming drive results in a thick outside edge that bounces down to the third man boundary for four
looped up high from round the wicket, Swann hanging back and nudging to midwicket for one
pushed down the ground for a single
defended the off side
Samit Patel on the counter attack! He skips down the track with great confidence and lofts a drive over cover. That shot wasn't too far away from the silly mid off fielder ...
Patel hangs back and slashes to cover point for one
pushed through cover for another single
pushed defensively into the off side
Yadav is nicely full to start, Swann digging it out back down the track
full again, and driven to mid off
a big swing and a miss! This definitely kept low. Swann had stayed deep in the crease and tried to heave across the line to midwicket, but the ball zipped right under the bat

undone by the low bounce! He should've been on his guard after that last delivery. Yadav moved his line a little straighter but again Swann swished across the line, again a low, scuttling delivery buzzed under his bat, but this time it clattered into the stumps. Swann has an accusatory look at the pitch as he walks off, but that's not the first one to have kept low today
Finn is greeted with a low, dipping full toss that is flicked to midwicket

Yadav appeals! Another delivery keeps low and strikes Finn on the back pad, adjacent to the leg stump. Was there a bit of inside edge on it? It doesn't look like it from the replay, but the umpire wasn't convinced enough to give it out
a very full delivery is squeezed through gully ... They might've pushed hard for a second, but decide against taking the risk. Also, Samit Patel.
Praveen hits a length on off stump, Finn defends
past the outside edge! It was the slower legcutter from Praveen, and Finn just played inside the line
an ambitious heave from Finn, and the thick edge loops over the cover field! He was targeting wide long on with the shot
slapped hard down the ground by Patel, but Tiwary, who is on as a sub, charges across from mid on and pulls off a good sliding stop
nudged just to the left of the man at backward square, and Patel calls Finn through for a quick single
there was some spice in this delivery from Yadav, which rose a little disconcertingly off a length to keep Finn deep in his crease
sliced away wide of third man. Yadav offered some width and Finn just flung himself into the shot, the extra pace taking the ball past the third man fielder in a flash
slogged down to long on, but along the ground. Just the single
Steven Smith won Australia's Twenty20 against South Africa with a shot just like this. Patel clears the left leg, gets down low and slaps a square drive through the field. Shot

well, that was unnecessary. The last shot was classy, this one was just atrocious. He knows the ball is keeping low, but he swings merrily across the line at a straight length delivery, and is cleaned up. And that's about it for England. Dernbach comes out to face the music, and this shouldn't take long
Dernbach meets his first ball with a straight bat and a high left elbow, the drive rolling to mid off
an offspinner is swept out to deep backward square
the carrom ball, not picked,  but a leading edge falls safely in the covers
Finn comes nervously forward, and then back, before opting to defend
Finn appears to be attempting to read them off the pitch here. He plays back once again, inside edging onto his pad
swung away just behind square on the leg side, but just the single
Dernbach manages to keep the final delivery out, playing deep from the crease in defence
an optimistic appeal as ball strikes pad well outside off
pushed defensively to cover
Finn attempts a sweep, managing a tame top edge that is hit so badly that it falls safely mid-pitch. Jadeja sprinted forward but couldn't get to it
that's anything but tame! Finn jumps out like Trumper to slam Jadeja high over long on. It's all a bit pointless now, but at least he's having fun
again Finn uses his feet, but this time he checks his shot and picks up a single through point
driven just wide of mid off, and they scamper through for a quick single
all over! Dernbach has a massive mow across the line, is beaten by an offspinner and loses his leg bail. Ashwin ends the game with his third wicket, and this was a real whomping
